content.question: The random variable <math alttext="K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has a geometric distribution with mean 16. Which of the following is closest to the standard deviation of random variable <math alttext="K " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?
